title: Order of the Shadows Ekko
body:
Instead of following the old trend of Shurima sand skins, Ekko should have recieved an Order of the Shadows skin.
Ekko has two abilities that are ghost-like. His Ultimate ghost and Parallel Convergence Ghost. Now, if you replace the techno-ghosts with Zed's Shadows you get a really cool looking skin. He can sport a bandana like his current Shurima skin but also have more armor  and his weapons be sharp on the edges but blunt on the tip like he has now. 
His Q would be a red orb surrounded by black mist.
His Dash and Blink would have shadow effects.

The only problem that I can see with this skin is that {{champion:245}} will actually end up cooler than {{champion:238}} himself.
